website_summaries.verdict: The Buddy bar set is a good starter kit for home mixologists. Owners also gain access to a drink recipe ebook. Contains all the tools needed for bartending classes.
cons: Rubber parts fall off under pressure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your at home bar!
customer_reviews.text: This bar buddy is amazing. Essential for any at home bar. Everything you need to whip up the perfect cocktail for your guests. The quality is amazing and I am loving the fact that it is stainless steel so I don't have to worry about it rusting when I don't empty the ice out right away or leave it in the sink to soak. Makes the perfect gift and is a great value I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: Only problem is lack of an organizer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly for the shaker. Everything works great. We've been using the free shakers you get with liquor gift sets around Christmas so this was a real step up. Only reason it didnt get 5 stars is that there's no organizer to store everything. We use the ice bucket to hold everything but you kind of have to dig around for what you need. And if you need the bucket then the tools are left scattered on the counter. I know there are products that come with a holder but based on the reviews the quality wasn't up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: love this purchase. only issue is the ice bucket is small and has no lid or way to even keep the ice cool.that piece its pointless but everything else is perfect! i used the ice bucket as storage for all the little stuff:)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like picture! The bucket is not very big but it is really nice set :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will make do..
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that on website they say you get 4 wine stopper but it came with 1 so that’s misleading information and the shaker is very smaller then it looks..
customer_reviews.author: francine robinson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter set. Bucket much smaller than I expected. Other than that, a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Dea Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made and will RUST
customer_reviews.text: This product was a joke - the shaker actually rusted. The parts are very cheaply made. The bottle stoppers all broke after two or three uses, and after a couple of weeks the stirring spoon broke. And this set isn't cheap! Not worth the money -- like most Amazon products I'm discovering lately.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Plenty of tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So far it worked great for me when making a few drinks. Washing it can be a little hard if you have big hands but that is fixable with a stick sponge. Overall, I feel as if I got my money’s worth. I recommend this product for beginners in mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous purchase. It is such a value! Now with this one purchase, I have an instant bar and have everything I need to make any cocktail. I cannot stress enough what a great value for the money this purchase was!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. It was perfectly sized. It is quite well made and worked out perfect. It looks really nice in our bar cart also, which is a plus since sometimes functional items don’t look as good on display. The ice bucket is small, but not if you are actually using it to hold ice for cocktails. Certainly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: valeh karimkhani

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Everything works great. The lid of the shaker is just very difficult to get off after shaking a drink with ice. When it gets cold it gets stuck. Other than that we’ve used the set regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend. He loved it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend. He loved it. It was good quality and a great price. It was perfect for an at home bar and included everything you need for a successful party. Great product would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a birthday gift. Was shipped to correct address and on time. Daughter loves it. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy With Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift and returned it. Quality was very poor and it looked “cheap.”
customer_reviews.author: Anne Conn

customer_reviews.title: Buddy 16-Piece Wine and Cocktail Mixing Bar Set–Bartender Kit was what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Both my lady and I like the Buddy 16-Piece Wine and Cocktail Mixing Bar Set–Bartender Kit and wish there was a top for the ice container but other than that we are satisfied. Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Louis C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I bought this for our dorm and since we are college students we didnt want to spend much. This set woks well for the price we paid, the only issue with that we have had is that one of the nozzle broke after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set as a wedding gift and am EXTREMELY impressed and happy with the quality. The set is a great value, as it includes everything you need to host a party, at a very low cost. I plan on ordering more of these for gifts, as well as one for myself! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heughens

customer_reviews.title: The label is on every piece.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bar set a lot. I wish the label was a little more descrete.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Has all of your cocktail/bar essentials included plus an awesome cocktail recipe book! Great price for an amazing product too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great set, Fast Shipping! I hadn't officially done many types of drinks before, but with their gift I was able to learn some more. I would recommend anyone this product, Ill post some pictures on a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my fiance and he loved it just wished the ice bucket was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my fiance and he loved it just wished the ice bucket was bigger.. didn't read the measurements before purchasing.. otherwise very compact and cool for home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Definitely as I asked to get for a starter kit
customer_reviews.author: Bret D.

customer_reviews.title: Bartenders delight !
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need to become a great bartender, and each item is made of superior stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Williams

customer_reviews.title: Small bucket
customer_reviews.text: The ice bucket it's big enough to maybe hold a bottle of beer. Thats about it. If your planning on chillin bottles this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome starting set
customer_reviews.text: I used this set to get into mixing drinks and it has a decent amount of tools that I can use to make drinks with. Havent tried them all yet but so far its working out great
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The set looks good. But the delivery was awful
customer_reviews.text: The set looks good. But the delivery was awful. I got a box that was already opened with two missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: nanita

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool set for A beginner the ice bucket is super small though
customer_reviews.author: desire marte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Looks nice as well. Very reasonable too! The downloadable recipe book is great too gives great detailed descriptions!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality materials. Everything I needed for my at home bar. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Howard

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size
customer_reviews.text: It’s some what small but I’m ok with that ! I just thought it was a full size set for cocktails!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised and great looking. The ice bucket is extremely small!
customer_reviews.author: John silvers

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable thought I didn't realize the ice bucket was so small.
customer_reviews.author: YoLanda M. Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Everything that was describe was in it and in great condition. Will be looking forward to making many ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything that was describe was in it and in great condition. Will be looking forward to making many drinks in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jonathanjoo

customer_reviews.title: You are getting what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly with everything conveniently packed within a small box! Very happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Angellic Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy to ensure measurements of alcohol
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to clean & doesn't stain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... set to my daughter and her boyfriend and they love
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my daughter and her boyfriend and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product!!! I am yet to use the product, but am impressed on first look!
customer_reviews.author: Govind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for amateur, at-home bartenders. Really impressive when you are entertaining guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Good size! Looks great! I am already enjoying my cocktails
customer_reviews.author: KaynaPinto

customer_reviews.title: One stop shop, high quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction stainless, complete set. Don't have to worry about missing a key tool for the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a visual. Haven’t used the product yet but I’m the next week or so I will be. Great for home bar or gift
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Walker

customer_reviews.title: he loved it. Living off campus now and "growing up"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a college student. he loved it. Living off campus now and "growing up" !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to access e-book?
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so-so. But my real question is, how do I access the e-book?
customer_reviews.author: Gibran Strachan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is bucket fits 1 wine bottle
customer_reviews.author: bryan diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Great value for the money. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bar set so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar set so much! There is so much of a variety, and the quality is excellent. I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eglitis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Impressive and professional looking. Adds nice touch to our bar.
customer_reviews.author: Abelardo Diaz

customer_reviews.title: but the other aspects of the kit are great!
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is on the smaller side and there is no lid, but the other aspects of the kit are great!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna A Hatchett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This set is not what I hoped for. I was looking for something a little nicer. Everything looks and feels cheap. The ice bucket is about the size of a large coffee mug. It is not insulated nor does it have a lid. The cocktail stirrer is the flimsiest utensil I've ever seen. A KFC spork is sturdier. Overall I am disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: ... bucket is smaller than I thought but otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.text: The ice bucket is smaller than I thought but otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Lyme4Life

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Made from thin metal. Will replace probably sooner than later. The spoon is made from two parts welded poorly together. The strainer is very bendable. The ice bucket does not make you feel like you are holding a quality product. With all of that said, all of the pieces will work. It's not like it's trash. Just know you can easily buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a Christmas gift and was embarrassed when the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift and was embarrassed when the round part of the stirrer broke from the stem during the first use. Additionally, the cocktail recipe book was emailed to me rather than printed and included with the product.....not a good presentation considering it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: CCN

customer_reviews.title: Great cocktail set!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great set! This worked out beautifully for my husband's coming home surprise. Stoppers fit well, pourers worked perfectly, shaker lid stayed on well, I just was hoping the ice bucket would have been a little bit bigger... But a great set all in all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this set a lot. It has some great things. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars and not 5 is because I can tell just touching it it's not the absolute best quality. I mean, it's ok for the price and my bf loved it as a Christmas gift, but I would have liked it to be a little more well made. We'll see how it holds up when we start using it more!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: POSITIVES - The set looks "official" and nice. - Very well packaged. - The tongs actually work and pickup the ice. I've seen/used so many that the ice just slides off... not this one! NEGATIVES - The bucket is smaller than I expected. - The wine opener has a rubber part that can off the first time I opened a bottle of wine. Not very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: mmoulton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, thin metal. Want to return but option not listed. No kid for ice bucket which is very small
customer_reviews.author: Melody C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This Ser meets my expectations for the most part. The muddler, the stoppers, and the strainer are great. The shot flaccid and the ice bucket are decent. The ice tong in a piece of trash and should nut have been included. Throw this in the trash before you drop ice cubes everywhere and get a bad impression of the set. Overall the set is a strong buy and a no brainer for the money
customer_reviews.author: Winchester of NC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect both as a personal item or gift. I love it and especially love the drink mixes they send you via email. That is a plus for my weekly girls night. The only thing I would recommend, and it doesn’t take away from the actual product, is a bigger box. When I got my package, the box appeared stuffed and the top would not closed. It looked as if someone threw everything in there. Again, doesn’t take away from the product but presentation is everything.
customer_reviews.author: AnewnewJoy

customer_reviews.title: Material Quality is GREAT for the Home!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item but didn't open it until later for a get together I was having. I was very well pleased but then I realized that the mixer wasn't included! Other than that, the items are great. I'm going to send a message to the seller and I'll post an update later.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real bar set and I could not be happier with it. All pieces arrived and are a high quality, heavy stainless steel just as described. I have to admit I have been in the show Bar Rescue for a while so I really shopped around for a quality starter set that had all the essential pieces and this was it. I was definitely recommend this as a definite buy to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anna the Amazon

customer_reviews.title: The item doesn’t seem to be complete to me
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the item for home parties and events. The items are very nice except the ice bucket is kind of small and has no lid. The book that I thought came with the set was in fact a down load able item of too many pages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My glass is larger than the ice bucket....
customer_reviews.text: How can I use an ice bucket that is smaller than some glasses that I own? This is completely useless and you should avoid it at all costs. Maybe, just maybe, you could use this as a novelty decoration piece to set on a bar and never actually use it. If you want a kit that is useable, this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my catering and bartending jobs. Also, great for a small wet bar.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Small ice bucket but good for the portable bar. nice to look at as well. Most needed tools just missing the shaker glass item
customer_reviews.author: Charleen

customer_reviews.title: Good for a home bar
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! I bought this for my roommate's birthday and our new bar. It was been used a ton! Works great when hosting parties while my roommate plays bartender.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Mixed many drinks with this. Never fails to impress. Very well built
customer_reviews.author: Papawheelie81

customer_reviews.title: Great bar set, ice bucket way too small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bar set, only complaint is the ice bucket is way too small
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Strength

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me daughter. She was very happy and is excited to use.
customer_reviews.author: jazzie

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. The seller was awesome with emailing product information and feedback questions! Will be a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jairrah L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Has everything you need to start out. Well made and totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful buddy set !! Wonderful addition for our bar
customer_reviews.author: Sewaren

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this for personal use as well as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces included in the set for a very reasonable price. It was a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Great 21st B-day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday party gift for a 21 year old. Classy and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. I allows me to make all the drinks I like.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, includes everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: High-quality stainless steel product. This was great to have on hand for my family during Thanksgiving. There are 16 different pieces, so you have everything you need to mix at home. Plenty of pourers and stoppers. My favorite part was that it came with an ebook full of tons of drink recipes as soon as you ordered the product. I am VERY satisfied with this set and I plan on using this as my go-to wedding gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although a quality selection, a standard jigger (1 1/2 oz & pony 1oz) measure should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B Vergona

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This set is sooo cheap. I would give it 2 1/2 stars if I could to be nice...for $50 its just super cheaper and I should've spent the extra money for each individual piece. The pouring spouts don't stay inside bottles and pop right out. I mean I guess not all pieces are useless. Won't be buying again and will be going to individual pieces instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P.

customer_reviews.title: light, flimsy & cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks small, feels light, looks cheap but it functions. I guess it will be OK. Taking to a summer home in a couple weeks and plan to really put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: reliable consumer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Missing items. A used product but one of the wine stoppers arrived broken as well.
customer_reviews.author: alan carter

product_meta.title: Buddy 16-Piece Wine and Cocktail Mixing Bar Set–Bartender Kit w/Essential Barware Tools-Large 25 oz. Stainless Steel Shaker, Ice Bucket, Muddler, Double Sided Jigger - Free 1000 Cocktail Recipes PDF
feature_bullets: ✓ MIX AND SERVE LIKE A PRO WITH THIS 16-PIECE STAINLESS STEEL, COCKTAIL BAR AND WINE SET: 25 oz. cobbler shaker, 50 oz. ice bucket, tongs, muddler, strainer, double sided jigger, 4 pourers, 4 wine or bottle stoppers and 1000 drink recipe e-book

✓ CREATE CRAFT COCKTAILS with this complete bartending kit. Makes almost any drink! Muddler mashes fruit for delicious cocktails or mocktails. One-handed martini drink shaker mixes up to 3 drinks at once. Make restaurant quality drinks at a fraction of the price

✓ CHILL, SERVE AND PRESERVE SERVE YOUR FAVORITE WINE, CHAMPAGNE or cider. Serve wine with dinner or guests who prefer wine to cocktails. This bar set includes a 50 oz. ice bucket and corkscrew. With this bartenders kit, pour with perfection with the 4 wine pourers and preserve partially used bottles with 4 no-leak wine stoppers

✓ PERFECT FOR PARTIES OR EVERYDAY USE. Designed for beginning or expert home bartenders. These bartender tools are made of premium food grade stainless steel. Designed for years of use, 304, 18/8 stainless steel is dishwasher safe, durable, and will not rust or leak

✓ A GREAT GIFT for a birthday, holiday or housewarming - our cocktail mixer bar and wine set arrives in sturdy box, ready to give! 100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE. If you are not completely thrilled with your purchase, let us know and we will make it right

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars251 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
